attributes.additional_details: i myself was a perfect candidate for the intermediate papers but unfortunately that option can't happen because those papers dont exist anymore and now I'm forced to choose a paper which is too high for me or a paper which is too low for me
attributes.background: This paper can secure a more achievable grade for the students who finds foundation too limiting in terms of grades and higher which is too mentally challenging and as a result gives the student a bad grade due to its absurd difficult questions
